short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For change width of the tab character in Pull/Merge Requests on GitHub/Gitlab/BitBucket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to change the width of the tab character. Suitable for any sites, including GitLab, GitHub, BitBucket and others.
